description.ar: With the help of smart devices, the Internet of Things can connect every aspect of your home. This creates a unified network that is accessible through any device with comfort experience. You will no longer have to worry about your home appliances or security. It automatically turning off when you leave for work. Your system will be able to sense when someone is in the home and shut off the lights and AC accordingly or provide you with alert
description.en: With the help of smart devices, the Internet of Things can connect every aspect of your home. This creates a unified network that is accessible through any device with comfort experience. You will no longer have to worry about your home appliances or security. It automatically turning off when you leave for work. Your system will be able to sense when someone is in the home and shut off the lights and AC accordingly or provide you with alert
